DOC.brief_summary: Exercise effective strategy manage juvenile obesity ; however ideal exercise training mode still unclear . In study , investigator compare health-related effect high intensity interval train versus endurance training obese child .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study High Intensity Interval Training Endurance Training Juvenile Obesity
DOC.criteria: age 8 12 year Body mass index ( BMI ) = 95th percentile , accord First National Health Nutrition Examination Survey pharmacological treatment evidence metabolic , hormonal , orthopedic , cardiovascular disease time study 's commencement participation regular exercise training program ( except physical education class , two day week ) least 6 month commencement study throughout protocol . nonobese participant physically active participant participant cardiovascular disease condition could preclude participation exercise training program
